meanings.definition: A design or picture that is transferred onto a surface
meanings.sent1: I put some decals of stars on my notebook.
meanings.sent2: The car had colorful decals of flowers on its bumper.
meanings.sent3: The decals of animals on the wall made the room feel like a jungle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright decal that stuck in my memory.
meanings.sent5: The decals of planets on the ceiling made it feel like we were in space.

meanings.sent1: She added cute decals to her laptop to personalize it.
meanings.sent2: The shop sold various decals for water bottles.
meanings.sent3: The decals on the gift box made it look extra special.
meanings.sent4: His words were like colorful decals that brightened her day.
meanings.sent5: The decals on the window added a festive touch to the room.

meanings.definition: To apply a decal to a surface
meanings.sent1: I will decals the new logo onto the company van.
meanings.sent2: She carefully decals the sticker onto her skateboard.
meanings.sent3: He tried to decals the picture straight, but it ended up crooked.
meanings.sent4: She decals her creativity onto every project she works on.
meanings.sent5: The artist decals the mural onto the wall with precision.
